parameters.name: ParentCategoryId
parameters.description: The ID of the parent category. The new category is created under this parent category. If this value is left empty, the new category is of the first level.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The ID of the tenant. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~) or [ListUserTenants](~~198074~~) operation to obtain the tenant ID.
